headline: Is Colgate-Palmolive (CL) Pricing Reflect Its Consumer Staples Resilience?
summary: If you are wondering whether Colgate-Palmolive at around US$80.87 is a fair deal or a stretch, you are in the right place to size up what you are really paying for. The stock has returned 2.3% over the last 7 days, 5.1% over the past 30 days, 4.1% year to date, and a 5.3% decline over the last year, with 3 year and 5 year returns of 13.0% and 11.0% respectively. Recent news around Colgate-Palmolive has focused on its position as a global consumer staples brand, with investors paying close...
